operationBinding.customFields: discover_id, phone, discover_txt , rec_user, upd_user, response_type ,execution_status
operationBinding.selectClause: t.discover_id, t.phone, t.discover_txt, (r.user_name||' ( '||r.personnel_name||' '||r.personnel_surname||' ) ') as rec_user, (d.user_name||' ( '||d.personnel_name||' '||d.personnel_surname||' ) ') as upd_user, dt.response_type, t.execution_status
operationBinding.tableClause: discover t, personnel r, personnel d, discover_rtypes dt
operationBinding.whereClause: r.user_name = t.rec_user and d.user_name = t.upd_user and t.response_type_id = dt.response_type_id(+) and t.call_id=$criteria.sessionId and t.deleted = 0
